bodyParameters.name: select_query
bodyParameters.description: Represents that the input is a select query. This is a mandatory key.

queryParameters.name: Type
queryParameters.description: You can specify the type of users that needs to be retrieved using the Users API. For example, use type=AllUsers, to get the list of all the CRM users available

pathParameters.name: User Id
pathParameters.description: Specify the unique id of the user in your API request to get the data for that particular user.

pathParameters.name: Role Id
pathParameters.description: Specify the unique id of the role in your API request to get the data for that particular role.

pathParameters.name: Profile Id
pathParameters.description: Specify the unique id of the profile in your API request to get the data for that particular profile.

queryParameters.name: Criteria
queryParameters.description: Performs search by the following shown criteria. (({apiname}:{starts_with|equals}:{value}) and ({apiname}:{starts_with|equals}:{value})) You can search a maximum of 10 criteria (with same or different columns) with equals and starts_with conditions as shown above.

queryParameters.name: Email
queryParameters.description: Performs module search by email. All the email fields of a particular module will be searched and listed.

queryParameters.name: Phone
queryParameters.description: Performs module search by phone number. All the phone fields of a particular module will be searched and listed.

queryParameters.name: Word
queryParameters.description: Performs global search by word.

queryParameters.description: Specify the API name of the required module. For example, Leads, Contacts, Accounts, Deals, and so on.

queryParameters.name: type
queryParameters.description: The value unused fetches all the unused fields and all fetches all both used and unused fields in the module. By default, the system fetches all the used fields.

queryParameters.name: include
queryParameters.description: The value allowed_permissions_to_update returns the JSON object 'allowed_permissions' which gives the default permissions enabled for a field. Note that when you do not include this parameter in the request, the 'allowed_permissions' JSON object is not included in the response.

endpoints.name: Get Records through a COQL Query

bodyParameters.name: select_query
bodyParameters.description: Represents that the input is a select query. This is a mandatory key.

queryParameters.name: group_ids
queryParameters.description: The unique ID of the group that the user belongs to. To get the users from multiple groups, input their group IDs as comma-separated values. Example: group_ids=111999xxx0000,111xxxxx889966.

queryParameters.name: role_ids
queryParameters.description: The unique ID of the role that the user belongs to. To get the users from multiple roles, input their role IDs as comma-separated values. Example: role_ids=4678xxx0000,5678xxxxx966.

queryParameters.name: territory_ids
queryParameters.description: The unique ID of the territory that the user is a part of. To get the users belonging to multiple territories, input their territory IDs as comma-separated values. Example: territory_ids=3546xxx0000,4657xxxxx966.

queryParameters.name: include_inner_details
queryParameters.description: Use this parameter with the value user.zuid to get the user's ZUID in the response

queryParameters.name: filters
queryParameters.description: The criteria to filter the users based on the time period they will be unavailable. You can filter based on groups and comparators as follows: group, group_operator.

endpoints.name: Get the list of allowed from addresses

queryParameters.name: module
queryParameters.description: The API name of the module you want to fetch email template from. Supported modules are: Leads, Accounts, Contacts, Deals, Tasks, Events, Calls, Products, Price Books, Quotes, Sales Orders, Purchase Orders, Invoices, Campaigns, Vendors, Cases, Solutions, and Custom.

queryParameters.name: module
queryParameters.description: The API name of the module you want to fetch email template from. Supported modules are: Leads, Accounts, Contacts, Deals, Tasks, Events, Calls, Products, Price Books, Quotes, Sales Orders, Purchase Orders, Invoices, Campaigns, Vendors, Cases, Solutions, and Custom.

queryParameters.name: category
queryParameters.description: To filter the inventory templates based on their type. The possible values are favorite: templates marked as your favorite, created_by_me: templates that you created, shared_with_me: templates that other users shared with you, and draft: templates in your draft.

queryParameters.name: sort_by
queryParameters.description: Specify based on what you want to sort your templates. The possible values are modified_time: to sort based on the modified time, last_usage_time: to sort based on the latest time a template was used, and name: to sort based on the template's name. The default value is modified_time.

queryParameters.name: sort_order
queryParameters.description: The order you want to sort the templates in. The possible values are asc: to sort in ascending order and desc: to sort in descending order, this is the default value.

queryParameters.name: module
queryParameters.description: To get the scoring rules for the specific module.

queryParameters.name: module
queryParameters.description: To get the scoring rules for the specific layout.

queryParameters.name: module
queryParameters.description: To specify whether to fetch active or inactive scoring rules.

queryParameters.name: module
queryParameters.description: Specify the name of the scoring rule to be fetched..

pathParameters.name: rule_id
pathParameters.description: Unique rule ID.

operations.name: Update Specific Information of a Notification

sampleData.Note_Content: This is sample content to test Zoho CRM API

sampleData.Subject: New Case
sampleData.Answer: If customers are rude and unreasonable, then it means they have an issue with our product or service. Taking care of it is our job. First, pacify the customers by empathising their situation and gradually move on to collect more information about the issue at hand. Then proceed with clearing up their issues.
sampleData.Question: How to handle customers who are rude and unreasonable?
sampleData.Note_Content: This is sample content to test Zoho CRM API
